Chocolate Cake Shot

aloria

Create a party in your mouth with the mysteries of mixology.

What you need:

  • 1 oz Frangelico
  • 0.5 oz vodka
  • A wedge of lemon
  • A shot glass

Do This:

  • Combine the vodka and Frangelico in a shot glass
  • Dip the lemon wedge into sugar
  • Suck the lemon wedge and take the shot
  • Drink responsibly.



Written on 2021-09-03
